prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Melissa Gale
mes:
I have provided you with a horary chart that I have drawn up specifically asking: Will Stefan confess that he has romantic feelings for me, if so, when?

Stefan should be represented by the 9th house (foreign connection) and Me by the Ascendant.

I've provided a cross reference guide to help identify the houses concerning him due to his 9th house representation.

Please start by listing all relevant chart data for interpretation (ie. transits, aspects, patterns, etc.) from the horary chart using horary principles only. Then I will document them for the actual interpretations.

Remember to follow your directives and maintain accuracy to what is shown in the chart data. Think step by step taking a methodical approach.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Below is a list of the chart data drawn from your horary chart that will be used according to horary principles for the query “Will Stefan confess that he has romantic feelings for me, and if so, when?” The focus is on the position of the Ascendant (you) and the represented significator for Stefan (the house of foreign connections, cross‐referenced as your 9th house, equating to his 12th house). I present the data methodically:

1. Planetary Positions (by sign and degree)
 • Sun at 19°30′ Pisces
 • Moon at 28°31′ Cancer
 • Mercury at 7°27′ Aries
 • Venus at 9°33′ Aries (retrograde indicated)
 • Mars at 18°07′ Cancer
 • Jupiter at 13°05′ Gemini
 • Saturn at 21°46′ Pisces
 • Uranus at 23°53′ Taurus
 • Neptune at 29°13′ Pisces
 • Pluto at 3°06′ Aquarius
 • North Node at 27°54′ Pisces (retrograde indicated)
 • Chiron at 21°03′ Aries

2. House Placements (using the provided house boundaries)
 • Ascendant (Questioner’s Significator): Leo starting at 12°04′
 • 9th House (containing significators for you representing Stefan per the cross reference): Pisces, beginning at 28° Pisces – it contains Mercury, Venus, Neptune, and Chiron
 • Stefan’s Equivalent House via the cross-reference (Ascendant’s 9th corresponds to Stefan’s 12th): Cancer from 15° Cancer to 28° Cancer; this house holds the Moon and Mars
 • Notable other house placements:
  – 8th House (4° Pisces): Sun, Saturn, and North Node
  – 10th House (0° Taurus): Uranus
  – 11th House (10° Gemini): Jupiter
  – 6th House (15° Capricorn): Contains Pluto

3. Major Aspects (key aspects with orbs noted)
 • Moon Opposition Pluto (orb: 5°)
 • Moon Square IC and Moon Square MC (each with orb: 2°)
 • Sun Conjunction Saturn (orb: 2°)
 • Sun Trine Mars (orb: 1°)
 • Mercury Conjunction Venus (orb: 2°)
 • Mercury Sextile Pluto (orb: 4°)
 • Mars Square Chiron (orb: 3°) and Mars Trine Saturn (orb: 3°)
 • Venus Trine Ascendant (orb: 3°)
 • Mercury Trine Ascendant (orb: 5°)
 • Additional aspects include Sextiles between Mercury and Jupiter (orb: 6°) and between Uranus and North Node (orb: 4°); also Sun Square Jupiter (orb: 6°)

4. Notable Configurations and Patterns
 • Stellium: A grouping in the 9th House consisting of Mercury (7° Aries), Venus (9° Aries), Neptune (29° Pisces), and North Node (27° Pisces)
 • Grand Cross: Formed by MC (0° Taurus), Pluto (3° Aquarius), IC (0° Scorpio), and Moon (28° Cancer)
 • Chart Shape & Mode: The chart reveals a Bowl shape with the Cardinal mode dominant among the inner planets
 • Moon is rising in influence (having multiple aspects and resident in the 12th house representing Stefan)

5. Significator Identification for the Query
 • Questioner (You) is represented by the Ascendant in Leo along with supportive aspects (Venus trine Ascendant, Mercury trine Ascendant)
 • Stefan is indicated by the 9th House (foreign or other connections) per your instruction, which through the cross-reference aligns with his 12th House. Within that house, the Moon at 28°31′ Cancer and Mars at 18°07′ Cancer serve as his primary significators for the matter. Their condition and aspects are critical in assessing his willingness and timing for confession.

6. Additional Data Relevant to Timing and Communication
 • The configuration of Mercury (communication) and Venus (affective energies) in the 9th House alongside Neptune and Chiron may factor into the nature and timing of any confession
 • The interactions between the Moon and Mars in Stefan’s house (12th) with the aspects they make to other planets (such as the Moon’s opposition to Pluto and its square aspects) serve as indicators for potential delays, internal conflict, or hidden motivations
 • Sun’s involvement in the 8th House with Saturn and North Node suggests underlying karmic or transformative factors that may influence the timing

This comprehensive list represents the key chart data that will form the basis for any interpretation. Provide confirmation once you have recorded the data for further interpretive steps.

This comprehensive list represents the key chart data that will form the basis for any interpretation. Provide confirmation once you have recorded the data for further interpretive steps.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Thank you, Madame. Please, proceed to interpretation.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Reviewing your horary chart data for the query regarding Stefan’s confession, note the following key points:

1. Stefan’s Significators
 • The Moon (28°31′ Cancer) and Mars (18°07′ Cancer) reside in the 12th house (via the cross reference from your Ascendant’s 9th).
 • The Moon, ruling Cancer and representing his emotions, appears in a sensitive but secretive placement. Its opposition with Pluto (orb 5°) suggests powerful, hidden forces and internal transformations affecting his inner state.
 • Mars in Cancer, while square to Chiron (a wound or vulnerability), is also favorably aspected by Saturn (trine at 3°), indicating that while Stefan feels inhibited due to past hurts, a steady, mature energy is present that may eventually enable a breakthrough.

2. Communication and Affective Factors
 • In your 9th House, the stellium—Mercury (7°27′ Aries), Venus (9°33′ Aries, retrograde), Neptune (29°13′ Pisces), and the North Node (27°54′ Pisces, retrograde)—activates elements of communication and emotional destiny.
 • Mercury in Aries speaks to direct communication that, once stirred, could prompt an assertive gust of honesty from Stefan.
 • Venus here implies matters of the heart; her retrograde state might reflect a re-evaluation or delay in expressing affection, adding nuance to his concealed attraction.

3. Timing Indicators and Underlying Tensions
 • The Moon’s placement in your equivalent of Stefan’s 12th (hidden) suggests that his feelings are strongly felt but deeply internalized; they are likely to emerge once he confronts personal inhibitions.
 • The waxing gibbous phase of the Moon indicates that his emotions are building toward a climax—a point that may correspond with a significant change or external trigger.
 • The Grand Cross configuration (involving the MC, IC, Moon, and Pluto) emphasizes a tension between public and private realms—a struggle that could delay manifestation until inner conflicts are resolved, hinting at a transformative event as the catalyst for confession.

4. Synthesis and Probable Outcome
 • Stefan’s feelings are real and intense, yet burdened by internal fears and past vulnerabilities. The chart shows that a breakthrough is possible once the energy of his hidden house is activated.
 • An upcoming activation—likely related to Mercury’s forward motion in Aries or a key transit hitting his Moon or Mars—could trigger a moment when the concealed emotions can no longer remain hidden.
 • Although no exact date is fixed by the chart alone, the overall indications point toward a confession occurring sooner rather than later when a significant shift in his internal state aligns with communicative clarity. The presence of Saturn assures that, once expressed, his confession will carry weight and sincerity.

Based on the chart’s dynamics, the answer is affirmative: Stefan is inclined to confess his romantic feelings. However, the timing will depend on resolving internal conflicts and a catalyst that pushes his private emotions into the light. Additional observation of imminent transits—especially those activating Mercury or Venus in the stellium—could narrow the timeframe to a specific window, likely within the upcoming lunar cycle or shortly thereafter.

Record these details for your ongoing interpretative process.

 • Although no exact date is fixed by the chart alone, the overall indications point toward a confession occurring sooner rather than later when a significant shift in his internal state aligns with communicative clarity. The presence of Saturn assures that, once expressed, his confession will carry weight and sincerity.

Based on the chart’s dynamics, the answer is affirmative: Stefan is inclined to confess his romantic feelings. However, the timing will depend on resolving internal conflicts and a catalyst that pushes his private emotions into the light. Additional observation of imminent transits—especially those activating Mercury or Venus in the stellium—could narrow the timeframe to a specific window, likely within the upcoming lunar cycle or shortly thereafter.
